From: "Burrter the Saiyan-jin" <americano37@...>

Hello. My name is David Smith, older brother of Michael Smith, or to 
you he's known as minime_316@....  Michael had been having a 
lot of social problems in the last few weeks, and I'm sad to say that 
about 2 weeks ago my brother took his own life. He overdosed on a 
drug. I won't say which one. He left a message for all of view. He 
wanted to thank you for being his friends, because he would have done 
this awhile go without you. He wants to which The Council weel, and 
his friends Kingler, Logo, Alloran and Soulstice to remember him. 
Though he said not to weep for him, just remember him. I didn't join 
his club to RPG, just to let you know my brother has finally reached 
peace in his soul. Thank You.
